name: Gosth Triangle
description:
n "Gosth triangle," you find yourself in a mysterious world full of ghosts and danger. You are a brave triangle who has been called upon to save the day, and your mission is to eliminate all the ghosts that are hiding in each level.

The ghosts are scattered throughout the map and are hiding in hard-to-reach places. As a triangle, you'll have to use your agility and special abilities to jump, run, and shoot laser beams to defeat the ghosts and advance to the next level.

As you progress, the ghosts will become more cunning and dangerous, so you'll have to be alert and always ready to face new challenges. But don't worry, you'll be able to unlock new abilities and upgrades for your triangle as you advance in the game, which will help you face the increasingly difficult challenges that await you.

Are you ready to accept the challenge and face the ghosts? Then get ready for an exciting adventure in "Ghosth triangle"!
